title: Curriculum Development Workshop Through Social Studies Learning Object Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of primary and secondary education curricula, ability to adapt to online learning environments
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course for strengthening social studies curriculum design competencies targeting pre-service elementary teachers. Focuses on learning object reuse and metadata utilization skill development

learning_goals: Learners can write social studies curriculum design documents with 80% accuracy using learning object metadata standards
Learners can produce draft standard curricula for each subject by combining at least two theory-practice integrated knowledge objects
Learners can propose at least three curriculum improvement plans through peer assessment applying a learning design support framework
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
